doc.field: This series (arranged alphabetically, bulk 1960-) contains Communist Party internal documents primarily re: the "Negro Question" (1930s-1980s), notes taken at several 1983 meetings of the Party's Political Bureau, Central Committee, and African-American Commission, a notebook from a 1961 trip to the USSR, materials related to a course taught at the Jefferson School of Social Science, a file of Democratic Party of California documents re the 1932 mobilization of African American voters (Pittman was an advocate of realigning the African American vote from its traditional Republican Party orientation), and clippings and ephemera relating to various events and topics.
